about_the_game:
Step into the realm of royalty with the Imperial Cache Pack for Dungeon Defenders II! This regal pack bestows upon your heroes cosmetic finery fit for kings and queens, along with a treasury of gems and Shards that will let you command respect and power across Etheria!

This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.

This pack contains:

4,800 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes, and more. (4,000 + 800 Extra Gems!)

5 Mythical Defender Packs to gain any number of cosmetic rewards to look your best!

Two Shard Packs from Campaign and every level of Chaos (22 total!) to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.

Legendary Autumeow Pet to wreck your enemies with natural power.
